/*AgreementBoard.selectAgreementList */ SELECT ROWNUM AS RNUM , BRD_AGR_IDX , BRD_AGR_TYPE , ( SELECT CMN_COM_NM FROM T_CMM_COM WHERE CMN_COM_IDX = BRD_AGR_TYPE )AS BRD_CMN_COM_NM , ( SELECT CMN_COM_USE_YN FROM T_CMM_COM WHERE CMN_COM_IDX = BRD_AGR_TYPE )AS BRD_CMN_COM_USE_YN , BRD_AGR_CONTENTS , BRD_AGR_REG_DT FROM T_BRD_AGR WHERE 1=1
ORDER BY BRD_AGR_REG_DT DESC

/*AgreementBoard.selectAgreementInfo */ SELECT (SELECT CMN_COM_NM FROM T_CMM_COM WHERE CMN_COM_IDX = TBA.BRD_AGR_TYPE) AS CMN_COM_NM, BRD_AGR_IDX , BRD_AGR_CONTENTS , BRD_AGR_REG_DT , BRD_AGR_TYPE FROM T_BRD_AGR TBA WHERE BRD_AGR_IDX = #{BRD_AGR_IDX}

/*AgreementBoard.selectAgreementHistoryList */ SELECT BRD_AGR_HIS_IDX , BRD_AGR_HIS_REG_ID , ( SELECT ADM_MST_NM FROM T_ADM_MST WHERE ADM_MST_ID = BRD_AGR_HIS_REG_ID ) AS BRD_AGR_HIS_REG_NM , BRD_AGR_HIS_CONTENTS , BRD_AGR_HIS_REG_DT FROM T_BRD_AGR_HIS WHERE BRD_AGR_IDX = #{BRD_AGR_IDX} ORDER BY BRD_AGR_HIS_IDX DESC
